    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140227</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140227</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dinamično prikazovanje medsebojnega delovanja dveh nabitih delcev</string>
            <string language="en">Dynamic visualization of the interaction between two charged particles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dynamische Sichtbarmachung der Interaktion 
zwischen zwei belasteten Partikeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visualisation dynamique de l'interaction entre 
deux particules chargées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization dinâmico da interação entre duas
partículas carregadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione dinamica dell'interazione fra due
particelle caricate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δυναμική απεικόνιση της αλληλεπίδρασης μεταξύ δύο 
χρέωσε τα μόρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visualización dinámica de la interacción entre
dos partículas cargadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz interakcije med dvema nabitima delcema s silnicami in ekvipotencialnimi ploskvami.</string>
            <string language="en">Dynamic visualization of the interaction between two charged particles with the use of equipotential surfaces and field lines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzajemno učinkovanje</string>
            <string language="en">mutual interaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ekvipotencialna ploskev</string>
            <string language="en">equipotential surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dynamische Sichtbarmachung der Interaktion 
zwischen zwei belasteten Partikeln mit dem Gebrauch von equipotential 
Oberflächen und fangen Zeilen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La visualisation dynamique de l'interaction entre
deux a chargé des particules de l'utilisation des surfaces et des 
lignes équipotentielles de zone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization dinâmico da interação entre duas
partículas carregadas com o uso de superfícies e de linhas 
equipotential do campo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione dinamica dell'interazione fra due
particelle caricate con l'uso delle superfici e delle righe 
equipotential del campo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δυναμική απεικόνιση της αλληλεπίδρασης μεταξύ δύο 
χρέωσε τα μόρια με τη χρήση των ισοδυναμικών επιφανειών και των 
γραμμών πεδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La visualización dinámica de la interacción 
entre dos cargó partículas con el uso de superficies y de líneas 
equipotential del campo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gegenseitige Interaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">equipotential Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interaction mutuelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surface équipotentielle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interação mútua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">superfície equipotential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interazione reciproca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">superficie equipotential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettricità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δαπάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμοιβαία αλληλεπίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισοδυναμική επιφάνεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carga eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interacción mutua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">superficie equipotential</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
